subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: For a period and a half, the Blackhawks peppered the Los Angeles Kings’ net with nothing to show for it. Then they found their offense and grabbed Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
snippet: For a period and a half, the Blackhawks peppered the Los Angeles Kings’ net with nothing to show for it. Then they found their offense and grabbed Game 1 of the Western Conference finals.
